entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:14 PM MST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 9:27 PM MST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Blizzard. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Blizzard developing late in the afternoon. Wind light except east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near the Richardson mountains late in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:27 PM MST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Blizzard. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:27 PM MST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 26. Forecast issued 9:27 PM MST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 29.
